    • Method Detail

      • setRegularizationFactor

        public Maxent.Trainer setRegularizationFactor(double lambda)
        Sets the regularization factor. λ > 0 gives a "regularized" estimate of linear weights which often has superior generalization performance, especially when the dimensionality is high.
        Parameters:
        lambda - regularization factor.

      • setTolerance

        public Maxent.Trainer setTolerance(double tol)
        Sets the tolerance for BFGS stopping iterations.
        Parameters:
        tol - tolerance for stopping iterations.

      • setMaxNumIteration

        public Maxent.Trainer setMaxNumIteration(int maxIter)
        Sets the maximum number of BFGS stopping iterations.
        Parameters:
        maxIter - maximum number of iterations.

        Specified by:
